title: panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
```
$ cat redis.go
package main

import rds "gopkg.in/redis.v3"

func main() {
    client := rds.NewClient(&rds.Options{
        // Network: "tcp",
        Addr: "192.168.33.20:6379",
    })
    if client == nil {
        panic("Redis NewClient failed")
    }

    err := client.Ping().Err()

    if err != nil {
        panic("rds.NewClient error : " + err.Error())
    }
}
```
